oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Jim Beavers - 2018-02-24
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by singer songwriter Jim Beavers from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on February 24, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Beavers;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments by Sara Lederach begin in progress / (02:13) Opening comments from Jim / (02:45) Introduces the first song / (02:58) Performs Am I The Only One / (05:45) Intros the next song / () Performs Why Don't We Just Dance / (13:49) Answers question about does he use paper or electronic means to write songs / (16:43) Intros the next song / (19:20) Performs Parachute / (22:44) Answers question about song structure, meter and rhyme scheme / (25:34) Intros the next song / (28:38) Performs Drink A Beer / (31:58) Talks about the previous song / (32:29) Answers question about who his favorite songwriters are / (33:49) Tells story about writing with Taylor Swift when she was 14 years old / (38:51) Intros the next song / (40:01) Performs Watching Airplanes / 43:40 Final comments / (43:56) Walk-out music / (44:20) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Beavers, Jim; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
